name: Cycle Jam
description:
This is the first pass of a game I hope to flesh out in the future. This ties into the theme of Cycles by having the player take on the role of a cyclist, controlling their horizontal positioning whilst their speed by cycling through different songs of different speeds.

I hope to be able to expand on this project more with possible ideas include; being able to allow the player to choose different songs, including music they already own digitally among other things such as customisation of the bike and rider.

Let me know what you think and I hope to see you at the next jam!
